section1.good_choice_reason1: are high in vitamins and fiber and contribute to your fruit goals

section2.user_goals: reduce added sugar, reduce sodium, and increase vegetable intake.

goal_feedback.feedback_text: Great work! You made great progress with increasing vegetable intake. This was due to your purchase of Fresh Romaine Lettuce Hearts because they are rich in vitamins and add variety to your meals.
Some choices this week didn’t align with your dietary goals. You purchased Nature Nate's Honey which didn’t contribute to your goal of reducing added sugar because it is a high-sugar product.
Some choices this week didn’t align with your goal of reducing sodium. Fresh Celery Stalk contributes to sodium intake despite being a vegetable.

section3.fruits_explanation: Including Fresh Strawberries in your shopping shows a wide range of nutrient-rich fruits that help provide essential vitamins and fiber. Fruits are vital for health as they provide essential nutrients that reduce the risk of many illnesses. Keep it up!
section3.vegetables_explanation: Your score benefited from Fresh Romaine Lettuce Hearts and Fresh Whole White Onions. Vegetables supply essential vitamins and minerals aiding in overall health. You're doing great by including various types of vegetables in your meals!
section3.grains_explanation: A lower score resulted from minimal whole grains like Great Value Extra Butter Flavored Microwave Popcorn. Whole grains are better for their fiber content and nutrient density. They help reduce cholesterol levels and lower the risk of heart disease, stroke, obesity, and type 2 diabetes. Consider adding more whole grain options.
section3.dairy_explanation: You included Great Value 2% Reduced Fat Milk, which gives a good calcium contribution for healthy bones. Dairy provides essential nutrients such as calcium and vitamin D. Keep going for moderate consumption.
section3.protein_explanation: Your score was bolstered by Great Value Chicken Smoked Sausage. Protein is mandatory for body tissue repair and growth and balances energy levels. Keep incorporating a variety of protein sources.
section3.fattyacids_explanation: Freshness Guaranteed Chunky Guacamole contributed, but your basket was lacking in healthy fatty acids like omega-3s, beneficial for heart health. Consider foods like salmon or nuts for better scores.

section4.refinedgrains_explanation: You managed to incorporate fewer refined grains, maintained by Mission Super Soft White Corn Tortillas. Refined grains can lead to increased calorie intake without providing essential fiber and can lead to blood sugar spikes. Keep sticking with whole grain products over refined ones!
section4.sodium_explanation: Fresh Celery Stalk contributes to the sodium level of your shopping. High sodium intake leads to hypertension and heart conditions. Aim to reduce processed foods that are high in sodium.
section4.addedsugars_explanation: Although Nature Nate's Honey, your overall basket maintained a well-managed level. This aids in managing weight and reducing dental problems.
section4.saturatedfats_explanation: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter added to saturated fats in your diet. High saturated fat intake can lead to heart disease and other complications. Consider avocados and olive oil as alternatives.

section5.recommendation1: Nature Nate's Honey contributed to negative Added Sugar. Next week, try fresh fruits or low-sugar alternatives.
section5.recommendation2: Fresh Celery Stalk contributed to negative Sodium. Next week, try incorporating more herbs and spices for flavor and minimize added salts.
section5.recommendation3: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter contributed to negative Saturated Fat. Next week, try avocados or olive oil for healthier fat options.
section5.food_to_substitute3: Great Value Sweet Cream Unsalted Butter
